{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$615.6K in 2021-2022** on contracts with NUCTECH COMPANY.

Across 4 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 2 have at least one amendment (50%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 45% and the average number of amendments was 1.5. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$496.2K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 6.62 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$2.0M. The longest contract was 10.41 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$4.0M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

- [Nuctech Company Ltd](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Nuctech%20Company%20Ltd%22)
